1370: Splinter was born in Die lange straet3 in 1370.
Got married to Aue at age 19 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Aue, Emgelberna, at age 19.
1371: Had a son with Aue, Dolf, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Aue, Clais, at age 22.
1374: Had a son with Aue, Brandekijn, at age 23.
1375: Had a son with Aue, Woubbrecht, at age 24.
1377: Had a son with Aue, Valken, at age 26.
1383: Had a son with Aue, Breghtgherus, at age 32.
1388: Had a daughter with Aue, Gisele, at age 37.
1391: Had a son with Aue, Wauthem, at age 40.
Lost son Wauthem when Wauthem was 1 years old.
